医学新闻来自 News-Medical.Net - 来自世界各地的最新医学新闻和研究https://www.news-medical.net/ en-GB
研究人员利用临床和遗传数据开发糖尿病预测系统由高丽大学医学院的 Nan-Hee Kim 教授（内分泌和代谢系的 Nan-Hee Kim 和 So-Young Park；健康科学研究中心的 Min-Hee Kim 和 Jae-Young Kim）领导的研究小组最近开发了使用临床和遗传数据的糖尿病预测系统。该系统已注册国内专利。 https://www.news-medical.net/news/20241205/Researchers-develop-diabetes-prediction-system-using-clinical-and-genic-data.aspx https://www.news-medical.net/news/20241205/Researchers-develop-diabetes-prediction-system-using-clinical-and-genic-data.aspx#comment https://www.news-medical.net/post.aspx?id=669ea9fd-c7ca-4588-9fb5-758ca27ed589 Thu, 05 Dec 2024 13:24:51 -0500 Researchers develop diabetes prediction system using clinical and genetic data
20世纪初美国人拥有住房与长寿有关牛津大学研究人员的一项新研究发现，在成年早期拥有一套住房，二十世纪初出生的美国男性的寿命会延长大约四个月。 https://www.news-medical.net/news/20241205/Homeownership-linked-to-longer-life-for-early-20th- century-Americans.aspx https://www.news-medical.net/news/20241205/Homeownership-linked-to-longer-life-for-early-20th- century-Americans.aspx#comment https://www.news-medical.net/post.aspx?id=3229191e-0ee8-493e-ab3c-d009d2142379 Thu, 05 Dec 2024 12:58:41 -0500 Homeownership linked to longer life for early 20th century Americans
红线划线的遗留问题与寿命缩短和健康风险有关红线——20世纪中叶联邦政府拒绝向非裔美国人和其他少数族裔社区提供住房贷款的做法——长期以来一直与不良的健康结果联系在一起，包括不同种族和族裔群体之间不同的总体死亡率。 https://www.news-medical.net/news/20241205/Redlineds-legacy-linked-with-shortened-lifespan-and-health-risks.aspx https://www.news-medical.net/news/20241205/Redlineds-legacy-linked-with-shortened-lifespan-and-health-risks.aspx#comment https://www.news-medical.net/post.aspx?id=7ed30f0b-fab3-4cd7-88fd-751d9bbd9f51 Thu, 05 Dec 2024 12:44:39 -0500 Redlining's legacy associated with shortened lifespan and health risks
研究发现家居产品中隐藏的化学风险西南研究所 (SwRI) 与环境保护局 (EPA) 合作，对 81 种常见家居用品的化学成分进行了表征。研究人员还评估了用户的潜在风险。 https://www.news-medical.net/news/20241205/Study-identizes-hidden-chemical-risks-in-household-products.aspx https://www.news-medical.net/news/20241205/Study-identizes-hidden-chemical-risks-in-household-products.aspx#comment https://www.news-medical.net/post.aspx?id=90fce8ea-b2d2-4554-b1b8-f4c045e24e5a Thu, 05 Dec 2024 12:07:13 -0500 Study identifies hidden chemical risks in household products
人们对直接面向消费者的健康测试的准确性和安全性越来越担忧今天《英国医学杂志》的专家认为，更好的信息和监管对于保护消费者免受直接向消费​​者宣传的检测的潜在危害至关重要。 https://www.news-medical.net/news/20241205/Concerns-grow-over-accuracy-and-safety-of-direct-to-consumer-health-tests.aspx https://www.news-medical.net/news/20241205/Concerns-grow-over-accuracy-and-safety-of-direct-to-consumer-health-tests.aspx#comment https://www.news-medical.net/post.aspx?id=ee44b8dd-0aa4-4afb-8466-7662411bd4d4 Thu, 05 Dec 2024 12:02:28 -0500 Concerns grow over accuracy and safety of direct-to-consumer health tests
瘦素反应神经元的发现为肥胖治疗带来了新希望在美国，肥胖影响着 40% 的成年人和 20% 的儿童。虽然一些新的流行疗法正在帮助解决肥胖症的流行，但研究人员仍然对调节食欲的大脑与身体的联系有很多不了解。 https://www.news-medical.net/news/20241205/Discovery-of-leptin-responsive-neurons-offers-new-hope-for-obesity-treatment.aspx https://www.news-medical.net/news/20241205/Discovery-of-leptin-responsive-neurons-offers-new-hope-for-obesity-treatment.aspx#comment https://www.news-medical.net/post.aspx?id=991eb18f-3905-4747-9cc7-c386388eb08c Thu, 05 Dec 2024 11:58:23 -0500 Discovery of leptin-responsive neurons offers new hope for obesity treatment
研究确定了可以在心脏骤停后保护大脑的关键免疫细胞尽管心肺复苏术和将患者送往医院的比率有所提高，但只有约 10% 的人在院外心脏骤停 (OHCA) 后最终存活下来，这意味着美国每年约有 30 万人死亡。 https://www.news-medical.net/news/20241205/Study-identizes-key-immune-cells-that-c​​ould-protect-the-brain-after-cardiac-arrest.aspx https://www.news-medical.net/news/20241205/Study-identizes-key-immune-cells-that-c​​ould-protect-the-brain-after-cardiac-arrest.aspx#comment https://www.news-medical.net/post.aspx?id=17306bdf-9fa2-40bc-9109-f1ddf9ff4ab6 Thu, 05 Dec 2024 11:48:57 -0500 Study identifies key immune cells that could protect the brain after cardiac arrest
华大智造创新测序技术推动泰国红树林保护工作华大智造与 NOC 合作，利用先进测序技术保护红树林，应对环境挑战并增强生态系统的恢复力。 https://www.news-medical.net/news/20241205/MGI-Teche28099s-Innovative-Sequencing-Technology-Drives-Mangrove-Conservation-Efforts-in-Thailand.aspx https://www.news-medical.net/news/20241205/MGI-Teche28099s-Innovative-Sequencing-Technology-Drives-Mangrove-Conservation-Efforts-in-Thailand.aspx#comment https://www.news-medical.net/post.aspx?id=3f66faf4-fbbb-45eb-92c4-536672f3a93a Thu, 05 Dec 2024 10:33:00 -0500 MGI Tech’s Innovative Sequencing Technology Drives Mangrove Conservation Efforts in Thailand
肺干细胞老化导致缺铁并降低肿瘤形成能力衰老会导致缺铁，降低干细胞功能和肿瘤生长，同时增强铁死亡抵抗力，揭示新的癌症预防策略。 https://www.news-medical.net/news/20241205/Aging-of-lung-stem-cells-drives-iron-deficiency-and-reduces-capacity-for-tumor-formation.aspx https://www.news-medical.net/news/20241205/Aging-of-lung-stem-cells-drives-iron-deficiency-and-reduces-capacity-for-tumor-formation.aspx#comment https://www.news-medical.net/post.aspx?id=abefe500-1a52-4b44-a352-e55e50dd8639 Thu, 05 Dec 2024 09:37:00 -0500 Aging of lung stem cells drives iron deficiency and reduces capacity for tumor formation
用于心力衰竭筛查的人工智能工具显示出长期的成本节省早期的研究表明，使用人工智能心电图工具的初级保健临床医生比没有人工智能的情况下发现了更多心泵无力（也称为低射血分数）的未知病例。 《梅奥诊所会议录：数字健康》上发表的新研究结果表明，从长远来看，这种类型的筛查也具有成本效益，尤其是在门诊环境中。 https://www.news-medical.net/news/20241205/AI-tool-for-heart-failure-screening-demonstrates-long-term-cost- savings.aspx https://www.news-medical.net/news/20241205/AI-tool-for-heart-failure-screening-demonstrates-long-term-cost- savings.aspx#comment https://www.news-medical.net/post.aspx?id=d3672785-e32c-47f4-8edf-5d556b612315 Thu, 05 Dec 2024 09:15:15 -0500 AI tool for heart failure screening demonstrates long-term cost savings
